name: Browser Sandbox
description: Run any browser online, including Chrome, Firefox, IE 8, IE 9, IE 10, and IE 11, and more.
h2: Run any browser instantly online. Click to run with no installs. Supports all versions of Chrome, Firefox, and IE.
helpHtml:
Click on a browser to launch it instantly.

Save to My Applications to customize with plugins, automatic URL redirection, IP routing rules and network restrictions, permissions settings, ad blocking, and other options.

Deploy custom browser containers directly to your desktop, push to your organization, or publish to XenApp and VMware servers.
twitterShareText: Run any browser instantly with Turbo Browser Sandbox by @turbohq:
notAffiliatedWith: Microsoft, Google, Mozilla, Apple or Opera

name: SQL Sandbox
description: Run SQL Server, SQL Management Studio (SSMS), and other databases in containers.
helpHtml:
Click to launch any database server instantly. You can run multiple database servers to form a cluster.

Launch appropriate management clients and tools.

Connect to the database server using the following credentials:

Server name: localhost
Auth: SQL Server
Login: sa
Password: password1
twitterShareText: Run any version of SQL Server and SQL Management Studio instantly with Turbo SQL Sandbox by @turbohq:
h3Featured: SQL Server and SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS)

name: Citrix Sandbox
description: Run any version of Citrix Receiver online, plus top utilities for Citrix XenApp and XenDesktop administrators.
h2: Run any version of Citrix Receiver online. Deploy containerized to desktops or XenApp servers.
helpHtml:
Click Run to launch any version of Citrix Receiver instantly.

Multiple versions can be run side-by-side with no installs.

Press Add to apply IP network restrictions, permissions settings, and other options.

Deploy containers directly to your desktop, push to your organization, or publish to XenApp and VMware servers.
twitterShareText: Run any version of Citrix Receiver instantly with Turbo Citrix Sandbox by @turbohq:

h3Featured: vSphere Clients and Horizon Administration Console
